question.text: You are approaching a mini-roundabout. The long vehicle in front is signalling left but positioned over to the right. You should

explanation.text: At mini-roundabouts there isn’t much room for a long vehicle to manoeuvre. It will have to swing out wide so that it can complete the turn safely. Keep well back and don’t try to move up alongside it.

answer.text: follow the same course as the lorry
